Unlock: When you reach 6th level overall you may take the ability below.

As a minor action, you can tear the pages containing a single non-Legendary spell from one of your spellbooks and spend half of the spell's mana cost (rounded down) to imbue them with the power of a spell scroll for the corresponding spell. The chosen spell is removed from your spellbook. The pages crumble to ash after the spell is cast.

Once you use this ability you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
